problem.markdown: >>How many students earn a Bachelor's Degree in the US every year?<< ( ) 16,000 ( ) 160,000 (x) 1.6 million {{ Same source. About ten times as many world-wide. }} ( ) 16 million
problem.p: How many students earn a Bachelor's Degree in the US every year?

choicegroup.label: How many students earn a Bachelor's Degree in the US every year?
choicegroup.choice: 1.6 million Same source. About ten times as many world-wide.
